evidence.text: Person A: Harry, you remember each other, don't you?

Person A: Harry, what do you think about the gymnasium off to the side like that? I had imagined it differently.
Person A: Perhaps that's because you never enlisted, Harry. I think it's all a great surprise. Carry on, Laszlo.

Person A: They are waiting on us.
Person B: Push things along and see where we land with them.
Person A: Perhaps you can help your poor husband to sound less like he shines shoes for a wage.

Person A: Send their families flowers for Christ's sake-
Person A: Wait. Don't. Looks guilty.
Person B: I'll call Michael.
Person A: Mrs. Toth, you're up on your feet!
